content: required materials * this tutorial * yarn / cord * crochet hook * scissors estimated time 0 5 h - 1 5 h *depends on the size difficulty 2/5 colors yarn and hook suggestions my patterns are designed to be compatible with any yarn and hook size please consider the differences in size and structure when choosing different materials below are the details of the yarn and hook i used and about the final item yarn & hook material yarnart macrame cotton 788 - 2mm hook 3 5 mm final size width 15 cm / 5 9 in height 15 cm / 5 9 in yardage yardage/meterage 42 yds | 38m weight 42g used stitches - slip stitches - single_crochet - knit stitches - chains
